name: Poofers the Cat
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand while you control another "Poofers" monster. You can only Special Summon "Poofers the Cat" once per turn this way. You can tribute 1 "Poofers" monster you control; Special Summon 1 "Poofers" monster with a different name that is banished. (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY and target 1 Spell/Trap card on the field; destroy it. You can only activate each effect of "Poofers the Cat" once per turn.
